@pixi/interaction > PIXI > IHitArea

PIXI.IHitArea 

interface IHitArea

Interface for classes that represent a hit area.

It is implemented by the following classes:

  • PIXI.Circle
  • PIXI.Ellipse
  • PIXI.Polygon
  • PIXI.RoundedRectangle
